      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void printAndWrite(java.lang.String s)
      One function to both write a string to a file and print it to stdout
      void printEvaluation()
      Prints evaluation information, i.e. if a match is correct or false and if no match for a mention is found, its antecedent if it has one
      void printMention(Mention m, boolean isAntecedent)
      Prints and writes to a file different features of a mention, such as its string, id, head lemma, head string, discourse entity, set id and discourse entity id for evaluation purposes.
      static void printSievePerformance()
      Prints the performance of all sieves, i.e. the amount of links generated and the amount of correct links

      • printMention

        public void printMention(Mention m,
                boolean isAntecedent)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Prints and writes to a file different features of a mention, such as its string, id, head lemma, head string, discourse entity, set id and discourse entity id for evaluation purposes.
        Parameters:
        m - the mention
        isAntecedent - true or false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file can't be written

      • printEvaluation

        public void printEvaluation()
        Prints evaluation information, i.e. if a match is correct or false and if no match for a mention is found, its antecedent if it has one
